trans-unit.source: This type supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型支持.NET Framework 基础结构，不宜在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaException"></xref> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaException"></xref>使用系统提供的描述错误的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
